text:
-16-
January 129 - University director of radio-TV, has supervised growth of
a campus TV studio, wishes ETV position with more extensive facilities.
All phases of broadcasting experience; 16 years writer, director, producer,
news and management. Teacher; author of audio-visual texts, holds 3rd
class FCC license. Male, married, 45, Ph.D. Location open. $7000.
January 130 - Male, 39, single, B.S., presently employed as university
instructor and does radio-TV consultant work on the side; past experience
includes writer-producer for network stations. Would like to put knowledge
to work actively in educational broadcasting in writing, production or prog¬
ramming. Location open. $6500.
January 131 - Experienced manager and production director in both commercial
and ETV desires administrative position in ETV. Twenty years experience in
the field. Undergraduate degree in electronics. Has taught all phases of
radio-TV production and management. Male, 44, single, Ed.D. Prefers
metropolitan area. $7000.
January 132 - Teacher, 10 years, with some radio experience desires position
in ETV. Has completed a TV workshop and had some graduate courses in the
field. Male, 39, married, M.A. Wants South or Southwest. Salary open.
January 133 - Male, 28, married, working toward B.A., desires position in
ETV. Has 10 years experience as TV actor and assistant in film company.
Also has worked as floor manager. Desires position around metropolitan
area. $75/wk. . . .
January 134 - News director for commercial radio station seeks similar posi¬
tion in educational radio. Is also'special events director. Male, 39, married,
M.A. Location, salary open.
January 135 - Male, 27, married, M.A., with 7 years broadcasting experience
as news announcer, producer-director and production manager in radio-TV
desires a production-direction place in ETV. Prefers locate near university
where he can continue with Ph.D. work. $390/mth.
January 136 - Male, married, 46, M.A. and working on Ph.D., at present
assistant producer for 10 hours a week on ETV station. Desires position
leading to ETV producer-director. Location, salary open.
January 137 - Production manager with commercial TV, 6 years experience,
wants production manager, director or program director position in ETV.
Male, 27, married. Location open. $400/month.
